html:
{% set show_debug = false %}
{{ doc.company | default('HERBAL GOODNESS') | upper }}
Nature's Super Foods Pure & Simple
Employee Payslip
Employee {{ doc.employee_name | default('') | upper }}
Position {{ doc.designation or doc.job_title or '-' }}
Payment Date {{ doc.posting_date }}
Pay Period {{ doc.start_date | format }} â€” {{ doc.end_date | format }}
PAY ITEMS
Basic {% set basic = 0 %} {% for it in doc.earnings or [] %} {% set tag = (it.salary_component if it.salary_component is defined else (it.get('salary_component') if it.get is defined else '')) | string | lower %} {% if 'basic' in tag %} {% set raw_basic = (it.amount if it.amount is defined else (it.get('amount') if it.get is defined else 0)) %} {% set basic = (raw_basic | string | replace(',','')) | float %} {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(basic) }} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Reimbursement {{ '{:,.2f}'.format((doc.reimbursement_amount or 0) | string | replace(',','') | float) }}
SALARY ADD-ONS / ALLOWANCES
{% set ns_allow = namespace(total=0.0) %} {% for it in doc.earnings or [] %} {% set comp = (it.salary_component if it.salary_component is defined else (it.get('salary_component') if it.get is defined else (it.get('component') if it.get is defined else (it.get('description') if it.get is defined else '')))) | string | lower %} {% if 'allow' in comp %} {% set raw = (it.amount if it.amount is defined else (it.get('amount') if it.get is defined else (it.get('value') if it.get is defined else (it.get('amt') if it.get is defined else '0')))) %} {% set clean = raw | string | replace(',','') | replace('â‚¨','') | replace('PKR','') | replace('Rs','') | replace('$','') | replace('USD','') | replace('(','-') | replace(')','') | replace(' ','') %} {% set amt = clean | float %}
{{ it.salary_component if it.salary_component is defined else (it.get('salary_component') if it.get is defined else (it.get('component') if it.get is defined else (it.get('description') if it.get is defined else 'Allowance')) ) }} {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(amt) }}
{% set ns_allow.total = ns_allow.total + amt %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if ns_allow.total == 0 %} {% set fb = (doc.total_allowances or (doc.get('total_allowances') if doc.get is defined else None) or doc.get('total_addons') or 0) | string | replace(',','') | float %} {% if fb > 0 %}
Total Allowances{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(fb) }}
{% set ns_allow.total = ns_allow.total + fb %} {% endif %} {% endif %}
Total Allowances {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(ns_allow.total + basic + ((doc.reimbursement_amount or 0) | string | replace(',','') | float)) }}
SALARY DEDUCTIONS
{% set ns = namespace(total=0.0) %} {% set candidates = doc.deductions or (doc.get('deductions') if doc.get is defined else None) or (doc.get('salary_deductions') if doc.get is defined else None) or (doc.get('deduction_items') if doc.get is defined else None) or (doc.get('deductions_list') if doc.get is defined else None) or [] %} {% for it in candidates %} {% set display_name = 'Other Deduction' %} {% set amt = 0.0 %} {% if it.get is defined %} {% set name_try = it.get('component_name') or it.get('component_label') or it.get('component') or it.get('salary_component') or it.get('description') or it.get('label') or it.get('name') or it.get('deduction_name') %} {% if name_try and (name_try|string).strip() %} {% set display_name = name_try|string %} {% else %} {% set name_keys = ['component_name','component_label','component','salary_component','description','label','name','deduction_name','deductions','deduction'] %} {% set found = false %} {% for k in name_keys %} {% set v = it.get(k) %} {% if not found and v and (v|string).strip() %} {% set display_name = v|string %} {% set found = true %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endif %} {% set raw_amt = it.get('amount') or it.get('value') or it.get('amt') or it.get('total') or it.get('deduction_amount') or it.get('amount_aed') or 0 %} {% set clean_amt = (raw_amt|string) | replace(',','') | replace('â‚¨','') | replace('PKR','') | replace('Rs','') | replace('$','') | replace('USD','') | replace('(','-') | replace(')','') | replace(' ','') %} {% set amt = clean_amt | float %} {% else %} {% if it is string %} {% set display_name = it %} {% set amt = 0.0 %} {% else %} {% set display_name = (it.component_name if it.component_name is defined else (it.component if it.component is defined else (it.salary_component if it.salary_component is defined else (it.description if it.description is defined else 'Other Deduction')))) %} {% set raw_attr_amt = (it.amount if it.amount is defined else (it.value if it.value is defined else 0)) %} {% set amt = (raw_attr_amt|string | replace(',','')) | float %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% set ns.total = ns.total + amt %}
{{ display_name }} â€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(amt) }}
{% endfor %} {% if ns.total == 0 %} {% set fs = (doc.total_statutory_deductions | default(0)) | float %} {% set ft = (doc.total_tax_and_pension | default(0)) | float %} {% set fn = (doc.total_non_statutory_deductions | default(0)) | float %} {% set fv = (doc.total_savings_and_investments | default(0)) | float %} {% set ns.total = fs + ft + fn + fv %} {% if fs > 0 %}
Statutory Deductionsâ€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(fs) }}
{% endif %} {% if ft > 0 %}
Tax & Pensionâ€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(ft) }}
{% endif %} {% if fn > 0 %}
Non-Statutoryâ€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(fn) }}
{% endif %} {% if fv > 0 %}
Savingsâ€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(fv) }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}
Total Deductions â€“{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(ns.total) }}
Gross Salary
{% set gross_calc = (basic | float) + (ns_allow.total | float) + ((doc.reimbursement_amount or 0) | float) %}
{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.gross_pay | default(gross_calc) | float) }}
Gross Pay = Base + Allowances + Reimbursement
Final Payout
{% set payout = (doc.gross_pay | default(gross_calc) | float) - (ns.total | float) %}
{{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.net_pay | default(payout) | float) }}
